metadata.Title: CVE-2012-4568 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Multiple cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilities in LetoDMS (formerly MyDMS) before 3.3.8 allow remote attackers to hijack the authentication of unspecified victims via unknown vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4568` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

letodms - 3.3.9+dfsg-1
letodms-webdav - 3.3.9+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: letodms package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3.9+dfsg-1').
